head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SIEGEL, LOUIS F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SIEGEL, LOUIS F.

block.p: SIEGEL-Louis F. Of Tenafly, NJ, and Bushkill, PA, age 56. Beloved husband of Judy Gattegno (nee Kuntzman). Devoted father of Ethan and Jennifer. Dear brother of Harold. Services ''GuttermanMusicant,'' corner Passic and Park St., Hackensack, on Monday at noon. The memorial period will be observed at the residence.

SIEGEL-Louis F. Of Tenafly, NJ, and Bushkill, PA, age 56. Beloved husband of Judy Gattegno (nee Kuntzman). Devoted father of Ethan and Jennifer. Dear brother of Harold. Services ''GuttermanMusicant,'' corner Passic and Park St., Hackensack, on Monday at noon. The memorial period will be observed at the residence.
